simplify_for_free.description: Publish, test, fix errors, and simplify so everything runs FREE

zapier_optimization: Combine similar zaps to reduce task count (stay under 100/month FREE limit)
Use Storage by Zapier instead of premium databases
Use Code by Zapier (Python/JS) instead of premium apps
Use Webhooks instead of direct integrations where possible
Schedule zaps during low-traffic times to spread task usage
code_optimization: Optimize scripts to reduce execution time
Cache results to avoid redundant API calls
Use batch processing instead of real-time (fewer tasks)
Consolidate multiple API calls into single requests
github_gitlab_optimization: Use GitHub Actions FREE tier (2000 min/month)
Use GitLab CI FREE tier (400 min/month)
Optimize pipeline to run only when needed
Cache dependencies to speed up builds
Run parallel jobs to reduce total time

test_plan.step_1: Activate all OFF zaps one by one
test_plan.step_3: Fix errors using Zapier Copilot + Claude Code

recommended_zap_consolidation.description: Reduce number of zaps to stay under FREE tier limit
strategy: Combine Untitled Zap with similar scheduling zaps
Merge two LIVE PRODUCTION SYSTEMS zaps if duplicates
Use Sub-Zap to create reusable components
Use Paths to handle multiple scenarios in one zap
Use Looping to process batches instead of individual items
recommended_zap_consolidation.target: 15-20 essential zaps (leaves room for task count)
